data.eml:eml: New species and new records of stomatopod Crustacea from the Philippines

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Ahyong, Shane T. (2004): New species and new records of stomatopod Crustacea from the Philippines. Zootaxa 793: 1-28, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.169642
